```{r}
library(tidyverse)
subway_file=
  read_csv(file="./NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(-division,-exit_only,-staff_hours,-staffing) %>%
  mutate(entry=recode(entry,"YES"=T,"NO"=F))
dim(subway_file)  

#The dataset contains lines, station names, station latitude, station longitude, routes, entrance type, entry, vending, ADA, ADA notes,
```
